Instructions:

Basic:

CHOOSE THE RIGHT FOLDERS, IS --> Internet Security, Premium --> Antivir Suite
1.Right Click on any Key.
2.Hover ur cursor to "Open With" And Click on "Antivir License Manager"

Advanced:

1.Open Avira Internet Security OR Avira Antivirus Suite 2014 Setup.
2.Check Custom Installation and Click Next.
SKIP the very next step if installing AA.
3.Uncheck Mail Protection And Web Protection and Click Next.
4.Click on License File(Its right above the Button for Proxy Setting)
CHOOSE THE RIGHT FOLDERS, IS --> Internet Security, Premium --> Antivir Suite
5.Locate License File.
6.You are Good to go!
